|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/20/2001 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 735858150569 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00006BBTN |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Thailand

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device appears to be PRISM 2.5 based.. but the device probably uses '''[[Symbol]]''' firmware.
The hardware code for this device's platform is not listed in WinUpdate. Flashing the device via WinUpdate *will* result in a bricked device.
This adapter seems to only work with the '''[[Intel]]''' drivers.
{{WiFiCert|W000200|09/27/2001}}
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Intel_2011b_usb_pcb_top.jpg|PCB top File:Intel_2011b_usb_pcb_bot.jpg|PCB bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
